turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there how are you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm doing this and how are you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Doing alright. how can I help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need some assistance in ordering a beverage from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great what starbucks would you like to pick up your beverage from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's see. I would like to.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pick up from a location near me. The ZIP code is 40601.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, never mind. I found that address, it's.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's 1605 North Jackson Street and it's in Tullahoma, Tennessee 37388.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great and what would you like to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Are you still there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you tell me if there's any seasonal offerings right now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There's several available right now including peppermint mocha and the black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Never mind.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, amazing. The peppermint mocha was what I was hoping for.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like one of those, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sorry it seems like there's a little lag here, Bare with me while we finish this up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No problem.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a grande peppermint mocha right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to get a venti of.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about a venti iced peppermint white chocolate mocha?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem, you got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you possibly have them add a double shot of espresso to that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Also, can I have double with cream on it and have it made with coconut milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a venti iced peppermint white chocolate mocha with double whipped cream and a double shot of espresso made with coconut milk from the starbucks on North Jackson Street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'll try. Also, I would like for them to double blend it, as a special instruction.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I've added that special instruction to double blend it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: In add three packets of Slender.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Can you read that back to me so I know that I told you in a order that makes sense?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, in Tullahoma, Tennessee. That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. I've placed your order. It'll be ready soon and you'll get your reciept via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Glad to help. Have a nice day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You, too. Bye-bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye.
